attributes.action: pressure councils to reduce the amount of traffic lights
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Councils are introducing traffic lights in increasing numbers when other, less invasive methods would suffice. Traffic lights reduce traffic flow, increase congestion and increase emissions. Councils should be challenged to use traffic lights as a last resort only and to progressively review each set of existing lights to see if other, more efficient road layouts can be used.
